ui.fcl.config.no_req_info: &cNo information available if changing this setting requires a restart.
ui.fcl.config.no_req_restart: &dDoes not require a restart for changes to apply.
ui.fcl.config.req_level_restart0: &eCLIENT: &cRequires exiting the world and joining back for changes to apply.
ui.fcl.config.req_level_restart1: &aSERVER: &cRequires unloading and loading the world for changes to apply.
ui.fcl.config.req_game_restart: &cRequires restarting the game/server for changes to apply.
